moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Disable
moves.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

moves.name: Foresight
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Supersonic
moves.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Poison Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust on the target. It may poison the target.

moves.name: Leech Life
moves.description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Sleep Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

moves.name: Signal Beam
moves.description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Poison Fang
moves.description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. It may also leave the target badly poisoned.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.
